body.name: Cordless Room Darkening Venetian Blind - 35 Inch Width, 64 Inch Length, 2" Vinyl Slat Size - White - GII Luna Light Filtering Horizontal Mini Windows Blinds for Interior by Achim Home Decor

FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Room Darkening Cordless Vinyl Blinds: Reduce heat and help save on the electric bill while darkening your room with the Achim Home Decor CO GII Luna Cordless Room Darkening Blinds. Engineered for privacy, these vinyl blinds with no cords to get tangled are child and pet safe. Blinds will fit windows 3/8" (0.95 cm) smaller and 1/2" (1.27 cm) wider than stated size. Actual blind is 1/2 " (1.27 cm) narrower than stated size. Actual slat size is 2".

Easy to Install: Includes all the hardware you will need with simple instructions to make installation easy and convenient! Features hidden mounting brackets designed for inside or outside the window frame installation.

How to Use: Whether you want to darken your room or take in the view, simply lift or lower the bottom rail to raise or lower blinds. Use the tilt wand to filter in the ideal amount of light and privacy.
Find the Perfect Fit: Available in 2 colors, Mahogany and White. These blinds have a durable, high-quality construction that won’t chip, dent, or fade.

Bringing Great Designs Home: Achim Home Decor has been bringing fashion and value to your home since 1962. Specializing in decorative window and floor styles, we pride ourselves on offering outstanding value with the highest quality standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cordless Room Darkening Venetian Blind - Effortless Elegance for Any Space!
reviews.reviewText: Stylish Simplicity:The Cordless Room Darkening Venetian Blind effortlessly combines style and functionality, adding a touch of sophistication to any room.Cordless Convenience:Enjoy a clutter-free look and enhanced safety with the cordless design, providing easy adjustments with a simple touch.Perfect Darkness, Peaceful Sleep:Achieve a cozy and darkened ambiance for better sleep quality and relaxation, as this blind excels at blocking out unwanted light.Customizable Light Control:Easily manage natural light and privacy with adjustable slats, allowing you to create the perfect atmosphere for any occasion.Effortless Installation:The user-friendly design and clear instructions make installation a breeze, ensuring a hassle-free setup for anyone.Durable and Versatile:Crafted with durability in mind, this blind complements various interior styles, making it a versatile and lasting addition to your home.Conclusion:For a winning combination of style, functionality, and ease, the Cordless Room Darkening Venetian Blind is the ideal choice. Elevate your space effortlessly with this stylish and practical window treatment! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, attractive, easy to replace.
reviews.reviewText: As will happen when sun shines directly onto window blinds, the cords in our last set finally broke and we needed to replace them. We were fortunate enough to order these. When they came, my husband did not have to drill new holes to install them. The blinds easily slid into the former casings that were already attached. It was a simple matter of taking out the old, sliding in the new. Viola! Our room darkening venetian blinds were up and working. Very pleased with them and the cost didn't break the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LOOKS GREAT BUT VERY FRAGILE
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We ordered two for our kitchen only thing is they sent us two with the turning rod on the same side and it’s a little hard to turn one as we have a dining table in front of them. That is the one shown on the video. Since it’s hard to turn the turning rod as it’s not on the outside of the window, when we try to turn it, the rod comes off easily. Overall looks great, love the color and is easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about these blinds. Perfect color, the style, the cordless pull down and pull-up method, and the price. Perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and design
reviews.reviewText: The install was very simple and the quality is very impressive especially buying blindly ( no pun intended). Would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not darkening at all
reviews.reviewText: These do not darken hardly at all but they look nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but Cheap
reviews.reviewText: I have had these shades for a few months. While they look great, they are already breaking (the string in them is snapping). I was severely disappointed with the customer service for the manufacturer and Amazon, both of which repeatedly sent to the other. I am still unaware if any warranty exists.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really love these blinds. Great quality and design .i bought them for my kitchen now i am gonna replace all the blinds threw out my house with them. Very satisfied and happy with them.
